metadata.dc:author: Andonegui Navarro, J
Aldamiz-Etxebarría, M
metadata.dc:description: CASE REPORT An HIV infected patient with cytomegalovirus retinitis with a CD4 lymphocyte count of 498 cells/mm3 after a good response to highly active antiretroviral therapy is described. COMMENT Some aspects of the immune system after highly active antiretroviral therapy remain unknown. CD4 T lymphocyte count might not be a good marker to identify some patients at risk of developing cytomegalovirus retinitis after this therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Retinitis por citomegalovirus tras terapia antirretroviral altamente activa: a propósito de un caso.
[Cytomegalovirus retinitis after highly active antiretroviral therapy: a case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos de la Sociedad Espanola de Oftalmologia
